fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Heal a player and grant them Powerful defense.
- After participating in a secured node, during the day, select 3 players. They will be purged of all harmful effects. You may also select 1 player to gain Basic defense tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you successfully save a player, you will roleblock them the next night, and redirect yourself into them.
- If you save someone with the above attribute, it will not trigger itself.
- Each player you save will be unable to vote you.
